title: How to write a leave letter because of a fever in modern English - Quora

response.answer_text: Begin your letter with the reason you are writing it. For example, “I am writing this letter to explain my absence for October 1 through October 3.” Follow your statement of the purpose for your letter with the explanation of why you were not present. For instance, “ I was unable to attend school those days because my mother was in a car accident on September 30th. While she recovered in the hospital, I needed to help care for my younger siblings.”
